Inflatable Boats: Inflatable boats could be used to navigate through the waterways of the town or city. These boats can be easily carried and stored, making them a convenient mode of transportation.
Drones: Drones can be used to transport goods and people from one place to another. They can be programmed to follow specific routes and can be controlled remotely.
Electric Bikes: Electric bikes can be used to move around the town or city. They are environmentally friendly, require minimal maintenance, and can be charged easily.
Solar-Powered Vehicles: Solar-powered vehicles can be used to move around the town or city. They can be charged using solar panels and do not require any fuel.
Magnetic Levitation Vehicles: Magnetic levitation vehicles can be used to move around the town or city. They do not require any fuel and can be controlled remotely.
